description: Gentle Moroccan spice works perfectly with tender lamb shanks. Serve with herby couscous for a real middle eastern feast.
keywords: Lamb shank,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Moroccan Style Lamb Shanks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L chicken stock, made with 2 stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan and seal each shank on all sides, cooking for 4-5 minutes until browned. Place the shanks in the slow cooker and add the onions, garlic and ras el hanout and stir well.
Pour the chopped tomatoes and stock into the slow cooker, add prunes and honey and cook on low for 8 hours.

Remove the shanks from the slow cooker, wrap in foil and pour the remaining liquid into a large saucepan on medium high heat. Cook down until reduced and glossy, this should take 12-15 minutes. Serve with the lamb shanks.
